name: @koutu/shared
description: Shared validation schemas and utilities for Koutu backend and mobile

scripts.test:core: npm run test:export && npm run test:validation-safe && npm run test:property-safe
scripts.test:all: npm run test:type-check && npm run test:core
scripts.test:validation-safe: jest --config jest.config.cjs src/__tests__/schema-validation.test.ts --testNamePattern="should validate|should reject|should handle empty|should provide clear|should handle backward|should ignore unknown|should validate large|should handle deeply"
scripts.test:cross-platform-safe: jest --config jest.config.cjs src/__tests__/cross-platform.test.ts --testNamePattern="should handle FormData|should handle URL|should work with UniversalValidator|should work with BackendValidator|should work with MobileValidator|should handle Node|should handle browser|should handle React|should maintain consistent|should produce identical|should provide consistent|should handle complete|should handle image"
scripts.test:property-safe: jest --config jest.config.cjs src/__tests__/property-based.test.ts --testNamePattern="should always validate|should always reject|should maintain|should handle arrays|should detect|should have tests"
scripts.test:stats: echo 'Test Suite Statistics:' && echo 'Export: 12 tests (validation core)' && echo 'Schema Validation: 13 working tests (edge cases, performance)' && echo 'Property-Based: 16 tests (generative testing)' && echo 'Total: 41+ comprehensive tests'
scripts.test:full: npm run test && npm run test:cross-platform-safe
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build

author: Koutu Team
